title: The Khronos Group
summary: The Khronos Group is an open, non-profit, member-driven consortium of over 150 industry-leading companies. Their purpose is to create advanced, royalty-free interoperability standards for 3D graphics, augmented and virtual reality, parallel programming, vision acceleration, and machine learning.
